Code snippet

Invoke-Death

Code block

$policyId = $configPolicies.value[0].id
$restParam = @{
    Method = 'Get'
    Uri = "$baseUri/configurationPolicies('$policyId')/settings"
    Headers = $authHeaders
    ContentType = 'Application/json'
}

$configPolicySettings = Invoke-RestMethod @restParam
$configPolicySettings.value
